"...Hah...": "...Sorry. Kinda spaced out for a moment there."
"...I'm fine. You don't need to worry."
"I'm well aware of my own limits."
"I was just finding my second wind, that's all."
"...Anyways, I've still got more surveying to do. See you around."
"Came here to meet with Manon, did you?"
"I assume you already know about her power."

"Apparently she's been using that power any
chance she gets if it means furthering the cause."
"Thanks to that, our surveys couldn't be going any better."
"The troops think very highly of her as a result."
"You could even say they trust her."
"...But reckless action that causes injury to oneself is without meaning."

"There are some things that can't be accomplished
alone, no matter how strong she is."

"...Though you once gave me that same
lecture, so I'm not really one to talk."
"Let's just see how things go for now."
